mapper.sql: a.article_id AS articleId, a.title AS title, a.content AS content, a.banner AS banner, a.class_id AS classId, a.sort_no AS sortNo, a.is_private AS isPrivate, IFNULL(a.visited_number,0) AS visitedNumber, IFNULL(a.support_number,0) AS supportNumber, a.create_user AS createUser, a.create_time AS createTime, a.modify_user AS modifyUser, a.modify_time AS modifyTime
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article WHERE title = #{title}
AND article_id != #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article( article_id, title, content, banner, class_id, sort_no, is_private, visited_number, support_number, create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time )VALUES ( #{articleId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{banner}, #{classId}, #{sortNo}, #{isPrivate}, 0, 0, #{createUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT , GROUP_CONCAT(l.label_id) AS label FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_label_auth ala ON a.article_id = ala.article_id LEFT JOIN label l ON ala.label_id = l.label_id WHERE a.article_id = #{articleId} GROUP BY a.article_id
